page.title: 10Village Hall & Playing Field
page.content: The playing field was bought by the people of Baltonsborough. The top half has a village hall which was built about 12 years ago. The bottom half was bought about 3 years ago. Money was raised by sponsored splashes, fayres, lotteries, loans and a grant. The hall and field are managed by representatives of village organisations and belong to the people of the parish. The Parish Council are the trustees. There is one paid employee, the care- taker. The hall provides facilitles for a youth-club, Cubs, Brownies, cricket, football, the school and the Horticultural Society as well as for for private parties. The upkeep of the hall is about Â£1,000 annually.
